General.Name: EUWAX Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: EUWAX Aktiengesellschaft provides financial services in Germany. The company manages various asset classes, such as securitized derivatives, domestic stocks, bonds, and other funds. It also operates BISON application for bilateral trading of cryptocurrencies. The company was formerly known as EUWAX Broker AG and changed its name to EUWAX Aktiengesellschaft in 2003. EUWAX Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1991 and is based in Stuttgart, Germany. The company operates as a subsidiary of Boerse Stuttgart GmbH.

0.Name: Mr. Dragan  Radanovic
0.Title: CEO, COO & Chairman of the Management Board
